N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 18.4 - Examination and hospitalization of prisioners

State Regulations

The director or director of community mental health
services who has received a notice in accordance with the foregoing section, if
licensed to practice medicine in the State of New York, or someone designated
by him who is so licensed shall forthwith examine the prisoner. If the
determination upon such examination is that the prisoner is in need of
involuntary care and treatment, the appropriate application and medical
certificates required by section
31.27
of
the Mental Hygiene Law shall be completed. The prisoner shall then be taken
immediately to an appropriate hospital for admission pursuant to such
law. Notes
